metadata.synopsis: A reaction to a dead avatar moving an item/touching them.

1.speaker: Minsc
1.text: Claws to the fore, Boo! Something makes Minsc's hair stand on end...
1.context: NodeContext: Player's ghost passes near to Minsc at the party

0.speaker: Minsc
0.text: What? Check yourself, if you do not believe me!
0.context: NodeContext: Minsc has no visible hair anywhere on his body. Up to Boo to figure out where Minsc is talking about.

2.speaker: Minsc
2.text: Boo! Is it you who fritters about so frighteningly? If you wish to dance, then Minsc will set you down.
2.context: NodeContext: Player's ghost passes near to Minsc at the party
